attributes.action: Reverse the government decision to give a £3m football grant to China.
attributes.background:
www.gov.uk/government/news/major-uk-funding-boost-for-grassroots-football-in-china

China is one of the richest countries in the world. This is a disgraceful use of UK tax-payers money which should be spent encouraging the uptake of sporting activities at grass-roots level in UK schools and clubs.
